topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Sample wr.json File for Installing the KVM + ESX Topology

body.p: The process for installing the KVM + ESX deployment requires several JSON files that will be used when deploying the HLM VM.

section.p: The following represents a sample wr.json file in the <cloudname>/vars directory of the HLM VM. The IP addresses are masked for security purposes. Use values appropriate for your environment.
